text: Maga jevha tyala ghe'una nighale ani sarvanni miluna drdhaniscaya kela ki tyala osada va khupa khola asa vihiricya talasi phekuna dyave. Amhi yusuphakade vahayi (isasandesa) pathavili ki nihsansaya (ata ti vela yeta ahe) ki tumhi tyanna ya gostici khabara asa sthitita sangala ki te janatahi nasatila
